Q8_W3. Summary Table: Thinking about the wellbeing of your local community, which of the following do you see as being most important in the year ahead (2024)? By 'local community' we mean the local area where you live.
BASE: All respondents
Significance Level: 95%
Supporting people with the rising cost of living
People caring and looking out for each other
Reducing loneliness and isolation
Preventing youth violence
Helping the local economy
Helping people to live healthily and well
Providing services for mental health
Providing opportunities for people to have a say in what happens locally
Bringing people together from across the community
Providing support services for homelessness
Providing services to support better ageing
Support for community projects and charities
Supporting people to find new employment opportunities
Connecting people together on shared interests
Providing opportunities for people to learn/develop new skills
Providing support services for people affected by domestic abuse
Providing support services for substance abuse
Integrating people, such as refugees, into the community
Other
